Boston Pompod

last updated: 17 nov 2021

  • zoom meeting room
    • meeting ID: 722 6446 3856
    • passcode: 297729
  • text thread

community infrastructure to get shit done! we use the pomodoro technique + and connect with each other for joy, commiseration, and collective accountability. pompod is an evolution of the gsd during covid-19 practice.

use the text thread to let people know when you’ll be on. join the meeting room.

the first 5 mins of each half hour is for checking in and listing out what you’ll be working on. the next 25 mins is for focused workflow. rinse. wash. repeat.
